channel.title: Problem with changing bank size
channel.description: Nevermind I found out that you can't make the bank bigger than that.

item.title: Problem with changing bank size
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

I think you have to do something with changing the int to like a byte or float or long or whatever I don’t know really… I don’t usually work with anything other then that… you could always try to re-write the bank void to load if something else is done like if an item is used but make it so it loads another type of thing basically copy the bank void and ints exactly and change the names then make another void to set what those ints are… like if you use the items on another item such as a backpack make the itemID become that int… you never know it might work… I have done something sorta like this except I made the item backpacks hold 5 extra items sorta like what rune ess pouches do for the essence… so it is actually kinda easy… then again that was only 5 items… :\

Read full topic
